column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=See Life
#Text=Through the Eyes of an Artist
#Text=How do you see life through the eyes of an artist ?
#Text=An artist is a person young or old with a gift to see the world discovered and undiscovered in different ways .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Observe someone who 's interested in art and point out unique things in the room or setting .
#Text=What is the first thing that comes to your mind ? what is the first thing that comes to their mind ?
#Text=An example would be if you see a black and white flower .
#Text=Would the artist notice the positive and negative space and shading and angle of the flower whereas you just think its pretty ?
#Text=Art museums are a great place to go to try to see the world through the eyes of an artist because that 's where artists have portrayed what they 've seen through their eyes .
#Text=Try drawing what you see when you look at an irregular or odd object .

#Text=Drawing helps to let you focus and break down line , shape , space , and mass when looking at everyday objects . if you do n't have paper draw the item in your mind line by line and see how it adds up to create the object .
#Text=When looking at an everyday object , memorize it in a familiar way then try looking at the space around the object or looking at it in a different way that someone else might see it .
#Text=Artists see life in a different way .
#Text=Literally .
#Text=Something that looks like one thing to a normal person looks completely different to an artist .
#Text=If you are n't sure you think quite that way , relax !
#Text=Most people were n't born that way !
#Text=The brain is built to be wired and rewired so you can most certainly begin to think differently .

#Text=The next time you see an ordinary object like a chair , do n't think ' chair ' think something new , something completely different , something a little weird , but do n't be afraid of weirdness , embrace it !
#Text=Play that game with yourself where you say the first thing that comes to your mind .
#Text=If at first you get average results , challenge yourself to think something completely different .
#Text=It 'll be fun !
#Text=Do n't be afraid of weirdness .
#Text=Its part of what makes artists so creative !
#Text=Being able to think of something that no one else does makes you completely artsy and cool !
#Text=Just think , if people like Salvador Dali or Picasso were ' normal ' would they be quite so famous ?
#Text=Try new things .
#Text=Artists do new things all the time , the unconventional the uncool , the odd , the eclectic .
#Text=If you see something you 've never seen before , pick it up .
#Text=If you see an old place you 've never been to , go inside .
#Text=You might be amazed at what you find .
#Text=Even if you do n't , you should be willing to take the risk .
#Text=Do n't think of things as having only one solution .
#Text=Or one anything !
#Text=No object has only one use , no words only mean one thing .
#Text=The possibilities of anything are only as limited as you imagine them to be .
#Text=If you see something cool , draw it .
#Text=Or do whatever it is artsy that you like to do .
#Text=Feel a perfect breeze ?
#Text=Write a poem about it .
#Text=See a funky outfit ? Draw it .
#Text=Hear a melodic sound , write a song about it .
#Text=Do a bit of what you do every single day .
#Text=If you do , by the end of this year you will have at least 365 pieces of artwork .
#Text=You will boost your talent and also be quite prolific .
#Text=Imagine you are someone , or better yet something , for an entire day .
#Text=Pretend you are them , speak like them , walk like them , behave like them .
#Text=True , you may raise some eyebrows but let them rise !
#Text=The more you do , the more quirky and individual you will become and then you will be able to have a deeper connection with that person or thing !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Creativity and artistic talent do n't necessarily come naturally but if you would like to possibly have a career in the field of art .
#Text=try to look at the world from someone else 's perspective-someone you know
#Text=Warnings
#Text=do n't get crazy ... well , not too crazy
